response.overview: After a homemade psychedelic smoothie results in a tragic accident, a carefree stoner is forced to hide the death of her girlfriend and live with the consequences. When the woman she loved returns from the grave as a flesh-hungry undead presence, grief turns to obsession and devotion becomes dangerous. Blending splatter comedy, queer romance, and grindhouse horror, the film explores how far someone will go to preserve love when it refuses to stay buried.
response.title: Dead To Me
